(Simplified: 鳐)
Chinese Definition:
①魚類的一科，身體扁平，略呈圓形或菱形，有的種類有一對能發電的器官，生活在海洋中。肉可食，肝可制魚肝油，皮可制砂皮和皮革。

鰩字的基本解释

鰩
yáo
见“鳐”。

鰩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yáo］
［《廣韻》餘昭切，平宵，以。］
“鳐1”的繁体字。
(1)文鰩鱼。又名飞鱼、燕鰩鱼。鱼纲飞鱼科。胸鳍高，特别发达，扩展后，可以在水面或空中作较长距离的滑翔。生活在大海的上层，喜光，夜晚常飞到船甲板上。
(2)鱼类的一科。身体扁平，略呈圆形或菱形，表面光滑或有小刺。口小，牙细小而多。尾部常有一对能发电的器官。生活在海中。可供食用，肝可制鱼肝油。

鰩字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鰩； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1476第08
【唐韻】余招切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】餘招切，?音遙。【說文】文鰩，魚名。【山海經】觀水西流注于流沙，其中多文鰩魚，狀如鯉魚，魚身而鳥翼，蒼文而白首赤喙，以夜飛，其音如鸞雞。【呂氏春秋】雚水之魚，名曰鰩。其狀若鯉而有翼。【神異經】東南海中有溫湖，中有鰩魚，長八尺。【本草】文鰩出海南，大者長尺許，有翅，與尾齊，一名飛魚。羣飛水上，海人?之，當有大風。

考證：〔【本草】文鰩出海南，大者長尺許，有翅，如尾齊。〕　謹照原文如尾齊改與尾齊。

ray
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yáo］
["Guangyun" Yu Zhaoqie, Ping Xiao, to. ]
Traditional characters for "鳐1".
(1) Wenray. Also known as flying fish, swallow rays. Fish class flying fish family. The pectoral fins are high and especially developed. After they are extended, they can glide for a long distance on the water or in the air. He lives on the upper part of the sea, he likes the light, and he often flies to the ship deck at night.
(2) A family of fish. The body is flat, slightly round or diamond-shaped, with a smooth surface or small spines. The mouth is small, and the teeth are small and many. There is often a pair of organs in the tail that can generate electricity. Live in the sea. It is edible, and the liver can be made into cod liver oil.
ray

[Tang Yun] Yu Zhaoqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Yu Zhaoqie,? Yin Yao. [Speaking text] Wenray, fish name. [Shanhaijing] Guanshui flows into the quicksand in the west. Among them, the multi-textured rays are like carps, the body of the fish is with bird wings, and the white heads and red beaks are blue. 【Lu Shi Chun Qiu】The fish in the water is called the ray. Its shape is like a carp with wings. [Sutra of Miracles] There is a warm lake in the southeast sea, with rays in it, which are eight feet long. 【Materia Medica】The ray comes out of Hainan, the older one has a long foot, has wings, and the tail is in line, and a flying fish.
